Package adrenaline.model.deck

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.model.deck.Card
      • adrenaline.model.deck.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Tile
extends Card
    Tile is a Card which contains Ammos and (optionally) a PowerUp collectible on the game board when a player is located on a square which contains one
    See Also:
